Website Development Project Scope

This project includes the design and development of a professional, responsive website that effectively represents your brand and meets your business objectives. Our comprehensive approach ensures a seamless user experience across all devices while supporting your marketing goals.

Included in Scope:

  • Initial discovery and requirements gathering
  • Site architecture and user experience planning
  • Responsive design for mobile, tablet, and desktop
  • Development of up to 8 unique page templates
  • Content management system implementation
  • Basic SEO setup (meta tags, site structure)
  • Contact form integration
  • Google Analytics integration
  • Cross-browser compatibility testing
  • Basic training for content updates

Deliverables:

  • Fully functional responsive website
  • Administrator access to content management system
  • Documentation for content updates
  • 30 days of post-launch technical support

Timeline: 6-8 weeks from project kickoff to launch

Not Included:

  • Content creation (text, images)
  • Custom functionality beyond specified requirements
  • Ongoing maintenance (available as separate service)
  • Third-party integrations unless specifically outlined
  • Extensive SEO campaigns or marketing
